text: Daniel Brocklebank (born 21 December 1979) is an English actor. He is best known for playing vicar Billy Mayhew in the ITV soap opera Coronation Street from 2014 onwards. He received a Screen Actors Guild Award for his performance in the multi-award-winning movie Shakespeare in Love. He was born in Stratford-upon-Avon, Warwickshire, England. == Other websites == * Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:English child actors Category:English television actors Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:English radio actors Category:LGBT actors Category:People from Stratford-upon-Avon
title: Daniel Brocklebank
